document_data.name: Brave Bustard
document_data.mainbody: The '''Brave Bustard''' was a tavern in [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Environment: The jacks for wine were made out of clay.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1372}}, [[Velzraedo Hlaklavarr]] got laid flat by [[Mirt the Moneylender]] at the Brave Bustard after trying to bully him out of the best seat. His bodyguards later carried him out.
